Self.Wiki:
Defines item lots that can be rolled upon item pickup, enemy death or granted via script.
When doing this, consecutive IDs are also rolled.
A single result is produced by each row.
A row will not be rolled if the flag is already set.

ItemLotId1.Wiki: The ID of the item awarded by this slot.

GetItemFlagId01.Wiki: The event flag set to ON after acquiring the item in this slot.

getItemFlagId.Wiki: The event flag set to ON after acquiring anything within this itemlot.

cumulateNumFlagId.Wiki: Holds the number of drawings for cumulative lots. The base event flag specified here + cumulateNumMax are used to save the number of drawings.

cumulateNumMax.Wiki: The maximum number of lottery draws for cumulative lots.

LotItemRarity.Wiki: Determines the SFX used to display the rarity of the treasure lot.

LotItemNum1.Wiki: The amount of the specified item given if the item in this slot is rolled.

ClearCount.Wiki: The offset applied to this lot for each game clear count. Used to point to a different item lot in New Game Plus.
